summary:
@aresuna, @saskia2402 and I made a Christmas collab.
The theme was Christmas date and I choosed my favorite ship...
body:
Merry Christmas 🎄🎁

@aresuna, @saskia2402 and I made a Christmas collab.

The theme was Christmas date and I choosed my favorite ship Hawksdeavor🔥💖

@aresuna did the very cool lineart and @saskia2402 did the beautiful coloring. The sketch was by me ^^

Please check both blogs out :] to see the other amazing pictures we made together:

@saskia2402 Kiribaku (where I did the lineart)💓

@aresuna Shinkami (where I did the coloring )💗


Have a wonderful Christmas time 💕

summary: Loud man- Aka my second fave!! Mistletoe Drabble: Hizashi Yamada x Reader:  You were Yuuei’s counselor, and as its counselor,...
body:
Loud man-

Aka my second fave!!

Mistletoe Drabble: Hizashi Yamada x Reader:

You were Yuuei’s counselor, and as its counselor, you had been asked to come to the Christmas party, You happily obliged to this, hoping you’d catch a moment alone with none other than Hizashi.

You sat purposefully under a doorway. You knew very well there was a mistletoe above you, though, you had done your best to hide out in this position. The only thing left to do was to wait for Hizashi, who happened to be speaking to Shota in a very animated way. You laughed softly at the interaction, and you felt your cheeks heaten up a bit at the sight of Hizashi.

As though he could read your mind, Shota pointed in your general direction, a subtly creepy smile plastered across his face. Hizashi followed his finger and his eyes landed on you. He suddenly looked incredibly eager.

Hizashi made his way toward you, pushing down stray strands at the top of his head. He was wearing his hair back in a messy ponytail, and he was wearing a stupid Christmas sweater with some pun about snow on it that didn’t quite make sense but you could tell it was a pun, nonetheless.

“So, (Y/N), I see you’re standing. Right here. You know.” He raised his eyebrows at you, shooting you what you think he’d imagine was a charming smile, but really just looked like an excited child’s smile. 

You smiled right back at him, though, the smile did nothing to hold back the growing blush on your cheeks. 

“Yeah, I’m standing here. Right here. You know.” You responded. You kept facing him but your eyes kept wandering away from him. It was short-lived, though, as he placed a hand on the bottom of your chin and turned you over to face him.

Your eyes widened a bit, while his narrowed in a sort of flirty concentration. 

“So you just happened to be standing under a mistletoe, and looking at me? Is that right?” He asked, perking a single brow at you in amusement. You didn’t answer, and yet, with that alone, your answer was pretty obvious.

You said nothing, and let your eyes close. It was his move next. 

Without another moment, you felt his lips meet yours. It was soft and captivating. You could feel a rush of emotions make its way through you. By the time he had pulled back, you had felt dizzy with emotion. 

You looked up at Hizashi, a tad dazed, and all you could see was a soft blush on his face and the brightest smile. 

“Merry Christmas, (Y/N).” He grinned, ruffling your hair.

summary: Hello and Merry Christmas Y’all! @saskia2402, @2j3i0ru8 and I made a christmas collab! Everyone chose a ship and then did a...
caption:
Hello and Merry Christmas Y’all!

@saskia2402, @2j3i0ru8 and I made a christmas collab!

Everyone chose a ship and then did a sketch of them. One of the others then did the lineart and the last one the colouring.

In my ShinKami drawing @saskia2402 did the lineart and @2j3i0ru8 did the colouring.

Check out @saskia2402‘s Kirishima x Bakugou/KiriBaku drawing where I did the colouring and @2j3i0ru8‘s Hawks x Endeavor/Hawksdeavor/Endhawks drawing where I did the lineart!

summary: I wasn't sure if I wanted to complete and post this during Christmas Day, but ultimately I decided that I'd get it out of the...
caption: I wasn’t sure if I wanted to complete and post this during Christmas Day, but ultimately I decided that I’d get it out of the way while I had extra time at home with very few businesses open. Anyway, this is for an art trade with MellowNite He requested that I draw a pair of characters from My Hero Academia acting like cutesy boyfriends. As I’m also slowly working on another couple-based picture, I had to think of something to fulfill his request and ultimately made this. How will he respond to this?

summary:
12/25/20XX 
It is that day of the year. Christmas. All of my classmates have gone home to spend time with family and other loved...
body:
12/25/20XX

It is that day of the year. Christmas. All of my classmates have gone home to spend time with family and other loved ones. I am currently writing to you in my dormitory. No, I am not going to take out my embittered contempt on the holiday itself. I am not going to do that to the people who celebrate it. Yet, at the same time, I am not going to sit here in self-pity and lament over why I am alone.

I believe I have figured out why this occurs. It seems that there is a calendar of making friends. While the task is something done year-round, I am focusing on the school year itself. September through mid-October is when you’re introduced to new people. Late October through mid-December is dedicated to spending time with friends old and new. The rest of the school year, these relationships appear to be long-lasting and nearly unbreakable. Is it that I spend all my time studying? Is it that I fear making the first move?

Is it my overall fear of attachment and that sort of bond? Have I been so afraid of being vulnerable that others consider me not worth investing time in…?

I’m getting carried away here. However, I think I have made progress, and here is why. For the past 5 years, I’ve spent Christmas alone. Given that this is my 6th year doing so, I finally acknowledged the one thing I unsuccessfully try to hide: It is that I am lonely. As time has passed, I’ve known deep down that I can’t maintain the facade of being alone, yet not lonely. As I come to realize that this is how I feel, it’s… painful. Very painful.

summary: like, i hope so. i rly hope so. i stick with bnha to laugh at it and the off chance that hori has an explanation to both...
body:
like, i hope so. i rly hope so. i stick with bnha to laugh at it and the off chance that hori has an explanation to both surprise us and provide abt the hero society’s weirdly subservient attitude

a couple of things have added up for the true villain theory to (coincidentally or otherwise) work. the league not appearing to be anything worthy or villain-like, the hero society seeming to be moving according to one invisible higher power starting from hawks, the league slowly questioning their rules and laws

have you watched sakasama no patema? bc it’s exactly like that
(SPOILER: it was the boy, not the girl who was upside down all along)

consider eren. unless you’re some variation of reigen arataka, it’s hard for true justice to be pure bc the nature of the job requires that you sully your hands directly. and the hero society i’ve seen so far is excessively, confusingly pure

a misguided dad and a retired legacy who was initially lost abt what else he was good for as the top 2 heroes. top hero sch that neither implements any sort of mental care system nor screen its students for preparation and resolve

wld you feel reassured if your top hero’s motto is “i smile to show the pressure of heroes and to trick the fear inside of me”?

this meta is what happens when i address all of my concerns and there’re too many for hori to play it straight

true evil and/or justice shld look more neutral like the rat principal who i suspect is a branch of the true villains, where better else than an academy to watch over your nestlings?

watching protags who’re in the dark abt the bigger truth isnt new anyway (snk, star ocean 3 etc) all might’s way of thinking is a bit archaic and while he doesn’t wholly agree, he may be in cahoots with the true villains as their motives overlap, whatever it is i think we know he definitely has a few secrets of his own and if there’s one thing abt prevalent figureheads like all might, if you’ve watched t&b,

there’s always the backing of an organization or team of ppl behind their shot to fame

why do i suspect all might? he doesn’t listen to sir and he says this rly ominous line abt aizawa which goes to show how much he understood his own ideas, is known for having a petty streak, there’re just a lot of hints as to why he’d cooperate with a less than savory force

(also all might had to have a hand in creating a legacy so harmfully great and singularly over-relied upon, if he thinks fear can be tricked with a smile he probably believes one man is capable of pulling off the invincible act too, this will explain a lot abt why he never did anything specific abt endeavor and why the gap looked simply profound from where endeavor was standing)

i’d be disappointed really if bnha concluded and nth was ever up with the hero society or ua or all might bc idk what else this fucking manga is supposed to be abt other than, incredibly, hori’s penchant for side stories (kouta, eri and gentle) that arent even horribly entertaining

even if bnha does turn out the way i suspect, the punchline doesnt warrant a serialization (sprinkled with sch events bc mandatory) this long bc sakasama is a film and just 2 hours in duration

reblog.comment:
like, i hope so. i rly hope so. i stick with bnha to laugh at it and the off chance that hori has an explanation to both surprise us and provide abt the hero society’s weirdly subservient attitude

a couple of things have added up for the true villain theory to (coincidentally or otherwise) work. the league not appearing to be anything worthy or villain-like, the hero society seeming to be moving according to one invisible higher power starting from hawks, the league slowly questioning their rules and laws

have you watched sakasama no patema? bc it’s exactly like that
(SPOILER: it was the boy, not the girl who was upside down all along)

consider eren. unless you’re some variation of reigen arataka, it’s hard for true justice to be pure bc the nature of the job requires that you sully your hands directly. and the hero society i’ve seen so far is excessively, confusingly pure

a misguided dad and a retired legacy who was initially lost abt what else he was good for as the top 2 heroes. top hero sch that neither implements any sort of mental care system nor screen its students for preparation and resolve

wld you feel reassured if your top hero’s motto is “i smile to show the pressure of heroes and to trick the fear inside of me”?

this meta is what happens when i address all of my concerns and there’re too many for hori to play it straight

true evil and/or justice shld look more neutral like the rat principal who i suspect is a branch of the true villains, where better else than an academy to watch over your nestlings?

watching protags who’re in the dark abt the bigger truth isnt new anyway (snk, star ocean 3 etc) all might’s way of thinking is a bit archaic and while he doesn’t wholly agree, he may be in cahoots with the true villains as their motives overlap, whatever it is i think we know he definitely has a few secrets of his own and if there’s one thing abt prevalent figureheads like all might, if you’ve watched t&b,

there’s always the backing of an organization or team of ppl behind their shot to fame

why do i suspect all might? he doesn’t listen to sir and he says this rly ominous line abt aizawa which goes to show how much he understood his own ideas, is known for having a petty streak, there’re just a lot of hints as to why he’d cooperate with a less than savory force

(also all might had to have a hand in creating a legacy so harmfully great and singularly over-relied upon, if he thinks fear can be tricked with a smile he probably believes one man is capable of pulling off the invincible act too, this will explain a lot abt why he never did anything specific abt endeavor and why the gap looked simply profound from where endeavor was standing)

i’d be disappointed really if bnha concluded and nth was ever up with the hero society or ua or all might bc idk what else this fucking manga is supposed to be abt other than, incredibly, hori’s penchant for side stories (kouta, eri and gentle) that arent even horribly entertaining

even if bnha does turn out the way i suspect, the punchline doesnt warrant a serialization (sprinkled with sch events bc mandatory) this long bc sakasama is a film and just 2 hours in duration

blog.name: everythingbaku
blog.title: kacchan's nickname enthusiast
blog.description: Fucking superb, you funky little grenade. All ships are welcome on this blog (unless its a pairing with a teacher or adult.) (a blog dedicated to anything Bakugou related. Ask box is always open and don't be afraid to ask for something to be tagged.) header commissioned from @feorie

blog.name: incorrectbnhaquotes
blog.title: season 3 amirite
blog.description: things that were 100% definitely said in boku no hero academia. not spoiler free. tracking the tag #incorrectbnhaquotes. submissions open!

summary: Shigaraki: real talk, superheroes can be so focused on stupid shit sometimes…arms dealers this, drug dealers that… take down the...
body: Shigaraki: real talk, superheroes can be so focused on stupid shit sometimes…arms dealers this, drug dealers that… take down the fucking government already you stupid bitches!!

dialogue.name: Shigaraki
dialogue.label: Shigaraki:
dialogue.phrase: real talk, superheroes can be so focused on stupid shit sometimes…arms dealers this, drug dealers that… take down the fucking government already you stupid bitches!!

blog.name: jove-bluh
blog.title: My Artblog
blog.description:
~*~*~*~*~

Hello~! I'm Feshnie. You may call me Feshnie or Jove, I don't mind^^ This is my designated artblog. My main one is ~*FeSHniE*~. I hope you'll enjoy your stay on my blog! Be sure to check my FAQ before asking any questions, thank you!

~*~*~*~*~

blog.name: deliver-imagines
blog.title: ♡I'm weak for red-haired anime characters♡
blog.description:
[REQUESTS CLOSED]
Heya fellows! This is @queen0fm0nsterz imagines blog! The fandoms I write about for now are Black Butler, My Hero Academia, Hazbin Hotel, Svtfoe and Deltarune!
Have fun!! :D

body:
Dating the Bakusquad would imply [HC]

💥Bakugo

• Lots of not needed swearing

• An unexpected huge amount of hugs from him, but just when you’re alone, because hugging you in front of people is not really “his thing”. He gets extremely flustrated when you hug him, especially when in public

• Him getting jealous whenever you talk to someone that is not the rest of the Bakusquad or him, especially if you are talking to Midoriya

• PROTECTIVE EXPLOSIVE BOYFRIEND, VILLAINS AND RIVALS HAVE BEEN WARNED

• Him trying to convince you to use “Lady/Lord [name quirk] Slaughter” as hero name, insisting that it would be the best matching hero name ever because “why the hell not, you always say we don’t look like a couple and matching names are like a couple thing?”, in his own words

this nerd i can’t even

• Him texting/calling you at 3 am because he secretly misses you but doesn’t want to admit it

• Mina, Kaminari and Sero teasing you both a lot, calling you guys “Our lord and savior Edgy Explosion Overlord and his Lady/Lord Queen/King of the Slaughtering” (which usually ends with Katsuki running after them with the intention of killing them), while Kiri is just like “aw you guys are so cute”

• Deep conversations about your and his feelings. He only opens up to you when it comes to how he feels, and is oftenly in need of reassurance and support. Obviously, he won’t esistate to do the same for you. He really just wants to see you smile, and knowing that you want to see him smile as well makes him feel better

• Kisses on the back of your neck

🌷Kirishima

• LOVE BITES. EVERYWHERE.

• Textes at random times of the day, usually asking how your day was or just a spam of red hearts

• Him constantly complimenting you. Kiri wants to make you feel appreciated, loved and important. On the other hand, he’ll become a bubbly blushing mess when you compliment him.

• Brings you out on dates and buys you all sorts of gifts, red roses being the most common. He thinks they are the manliest flowers he could ever get you

• Always trying to touch you, holding your hand, wrapping one arm around you, hugging you, resting on your shoulder… he doesn’t care if someone is watching you two, “let them watch”

• Nose boops

• A lot of cute nicknames, with Kiri’s favorite being “My Manly Pumpkin”

• Bakugo keeping an eye on you because “if you hurt Kirishima I’ll rip your face off”, but also because “if something bad happens to you Kirishima would be sad and he’s not allowed to be sad on my watch”

• Having Bakugo, Sero, Kaminari and Mina around at least three days per week, making you an honorary member of the Bakuquad along with Jirou

⚡Kaminari

• A lot of akward flirting and crappy pick-up lines. Denki here just doesn’t know how to do it right even if he tries hard, but at least he makes you laugh and that’s really important to him because he loves your laugh

• Casually compliments you, and loves it when you compliment him

• You taking care of him after he gets all stupid for using his quirk too much, which makes him extremely flustrated afterwards. If you tease him about it he’ll probably just look at the ground while blushing

• Wants to let everyone know you are his s/o. He’ll shout it until everyone knows that this beautiful human being is his and only his.

• Denki will jokingly and randomly give you a slight slap on the butt, because he is that type. He’ll laugh when he sees how flustrated you got, to him it’s absoluty adorable

• When it comes to actual romance he is a total dork. This poor boy has no clue. Just. No clue. So expect to see the rest of the Bakusquad trying to give him advice while you’re out on a supposed date

• Kaminari skipping some classes to spend more time with you.

You: “Denki what are you doing here, shouldn’t you be at school”

Kami: “I want to spend some time with you, is that bad?”

You: “Denki please go get that education you need it”

• Him sending you tons of memes and shitposts on a daily basis

• Kisses on the cheek and “quick kisses” on the lips

🔝Sero

• Soft kisses on your forehead

• Kaminari automatically becomes your best friend. There is no choice, and no escape.

• Romantic dinners and long walks in the park together hand-in-hand. Sero is the only one of the Bakusquad that actually knows how to be romantic, and he’s pretty good at it. Also, probably lots of flowers.

• Jealousy. Not too much and not often, but he gets jealous. Sero is not clingy like Bakugo is, so if you talk to someone normally he won’t mind, but if they start to openly flirt and/or touch you be sure that it will take him literally 3 seconds to be right by your side and to end the conversation by dragging you away.

• Support by both sides. Sero lacks of self confidence because of his quirk, so you’ll have to remind him how amazing he is. Of course, he will do the same for you

• Good morning textes, and he gets offended if you don’t respond

• Him usually calling you “Babe” or “Hun”

• Cuddles on the couch for at least two hours

• Having him resting on your shoulder because you’re so soft and he loves that.

👽Mina

• Your dates mostly consist into going to the cinema and watch alien movies

• Her trying to make you laugh because she just adores your smile. Also a lot of praise from her because “look at you you’re just so amazing!!”

• Kisses with pink lipstick on the neck

• Hugs from behind EVERYWHERE. Mina does not care if you’re in public or not, she loves you and she is not scared to show it.

• Her trying to spend all of her time with you. She’s always enthusiastic and she would do almost everything as long as you’re doing it together.

• SLUMBER PARTIES and sometimes the rest of the Bakuquad joins

• She’ll always sing you songs that make her think of you with a sweet voice, while trying to slow dance with you.

• She’ll buy you alien-themed gifts, because if you are her s/o you probably like aliens as well

• Mina will get you a pair of horns (if you already don’t have horns on your own) to match hers. Wear them everyday and you’ll make her the happiest pink gf in the entire Solar System

• Him getting jealous whenever you talk to someone that is not the rest of the Bakusquad or him, especially if you are talking to Midoriya

• PROTECTIVE EXPLOSIVE BOYFRIEND, VILLAINS AND RIVALS HAVE BEEN WARNED

• Him trying to convince you to use “Lady/Lord [name quirk] Slaughter” as hero name, insisting that it would be the best matching hero name ever because “why the hell not, you always say we don’t look like a couple and matching names are like a couple thing?”, in his own words

this nerd i can’t even

• Him texting/calling you at 3 am because he secretly misses you but doesn’t want to admit it

• Mina, Kaminari and Sero teasing you both a lot, calling you guys “Our lord and savior Edgy Explosion Overlord and his Lady/Lord Queen/King of the Slaughtering” (which usually ends with Katsuki running after them with the intention of killing them), while Kiri is just like “aw you guys are so cute”

• Deep conversations about your and his feelings. He only opens up to you when it comes to how he feels, and is oftenly in need of reassurance and support. Obviously, he won’t esistate to do the same for you. He really just wants to see you smile, and knowing that you want to see him smile as well makes him feel better

• Kisses on the back of your neck

🌷Kirishima

• LOVE BITES. EVERYWHERE.

• Textes at random times of the day, usually asking how your day was or just a spam of red hearts

• Him constantly complimenting you. Kiri wants to make you feel appreciated, loved and important. On the other hand, he’ll become a bubbly blushing mess when you compliment him.

• Brings you out on dates and buys you all sorts of gifts, red roses being the most common. He thinks they are the manliest flowers he could ever get you

• Always trying to touch you, holding your hand, wrapping one arm around you, hugging you, resting on your shoulder… he doesn’t care if someone is watching you two, “let them watch”

• Nose boops

• A lot of cute nicknames, with Kiri’s favorite being “My Manly Pumpkin”

• Bakugo keeping an eye on you because “if you hurt Kirishima I’ll rip your face off”, but also because “if something bad happens to you Kirishima would be sad and he’s not allowed to be sad on my watch”

• Having Bakugo, Sero, Kaminari and Mina around at least three days per week, making you an honorary member of the Bakuquad along with Jirou

⚡Kaminari

• A lot of akward flirting and crappy pick-up lines. Denki here just doesn’t know how to do it right even if he tries hard, but at least he makes you laugh and that’s really important to him because he loves your laugh

• Casually compliments you, and loves it when you compliment him

• You taking care of him after he gets all stupid for using his quirk too much, which makes him extremely flustrated afterwards. If you tease him about it he’ll probably just look at the ground while blushing

• Wants to let everyone know you are his s/o. He’ll shout it until everyone knows that this beautiful human being is his and only his.

• Denki will jokingly and randomly give you a slight slap on the butt, because he is that type. He’ll laugh when he sees how flustrated you got, to him it’s absoluty adorable

• When it comes to actual romance he is a total dork. This poor boy has no clue. Just. No clue. So expect to see the rest of the Bakusquad trying to give him advice while you’re out on a supposed date

• Kaminari skipping some classes to spend more time with you.

You: “Denki what are you doing here, shouldn’t you be at school”

Kami: “I want to spend some time with you, is that bad?”

You: “Denki please go get that education you need it”

• Him sending you tons of memes and shitposts on a daily basis

• Kisses on the cheek and “quick kisses” on the lips

🔝Sero

• Soft kisses on your forehead

• Kaminari automatically becomes your best friend. There is no choice, and no escape.

• Romantic dinners and long walks in the park together hand-in-hand. Sero is the only one of the Bakusquad that actually knows how to be romantic, and he’s pretty good at it. Also, probably lots of flowers.

• Jealousy. Not too much and not often, but he gets jealous. Sero is not clingy like Bakugo is, so if you talk to someone normally he won’t mind, but if they start to openly flirt and/or touch you be sure that it will take him literally 3 seconds to be right by your side and to end the conversation by dragging you away.

• Support by both sides. Sero lacks of self confidence because of his quirk, so you’ll have to remind him how amazing he is. Of course, he will do the same for you

• Good morning textes, and he gets offended if you don’t respond

• Him usually calling you “Babe” or “Hun”

• Cuddles on the couch for at least two hours

• Having him resting on your shoulder because you’re so soft and he loves that.

👽Mina

• Your dates mostly consist into going to the cinema and watch alien movies

• Her trying to make you laugh because she just adores your smile. Also a lot of praise from her because “look at you you’re just so amazing!!”

• Kisses with pink lipstick on the neck

• Hugs from behind EVERYWHERE. Mina does not care if you’re in public or not, she loves you and she is not scared to show it.

• Her trying to spend all of her time with you. She’s always enthusiastic and she would do almost everything as long as you’re doing it together.

• SLUMBER PARTIES and sometimes the rest of the Bakuquad joins

• She’ll always sing you songs that make her think of you with a sweet voice, while trying to slow dance with you.

• She’ll buy you alien-themed gifts, because if you are her s/o you probably like aliens as well

• Mina will get you a pair of horns (if you already don’t have horns on your own) to match hers. Wear them everyday and you’ll make her the happiest pink gf in the entire Solar System
